p: The development of new technologies that include nucleic acid amplification platforms, such as multiplex PCR assays, have improved the diagnosis and reporting of various infections [ 7, 8]. The burden of STIs has long been underestimated by the public health sector overlooking the “hidden epidemics” of such diseases. However, recently the alarm has been triggered to battle these infections where CDC, WHO and other organizations have conducted global plans which will contribute to a radical decline in new STIs and in deaths related to such infections [ 9].
